Deep Breathing

A simple yet powerful technique to activate your body's relaxation response.

1. Sit comfortably and close your eyes

2. Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 counts

3. Hold your breath for 4 counts

4. Exhale through your mouth for 6 counts

5. Repeat 5-10 times

üí™

Progressive Muscle Relaxation

Release tension by systematically tensing and relaxing muscle groups.

1. Start with your toes, tense for 5 seconds

2. Release and feel the relaxation

3. Move up through each muscle group

4. End with your facial muscles

5. Enjoy the full-body relaxation

üßò

Body Scan Meditation

Mindfully observe sensations throughout your body to promote relaxation.

1. Lie down comfortably

2. Start at the top of your head

3. Slowly scan down through your body

4. Notice any tension or sensations

5. Breathe into areas of tension

üåä

Visualization

Use your imagination to create a peaceful mental escape.

1. Find a quiet, comfortable space

2. Close your eyes and breathe deeply

3. Imagine a peaceful place

4. Engage all your senses

5. Stay in this space for 10-15 minutes
